DOC.brief_summary: OBJECTIVE : The project aim investigate effect three type plan ( individual planning , collaborative planning , dyadic planning ) physical activity among dyads.The influence three planning intervention compare active control condition , include physical activity education . PARTICIPANTS : The effect intervention evaluate among dyad two adult ( partner-partner dyad ) . Adults form dyad ( e.g . two romantic partner , two relative , two co-worker , two friend ) regular contact least one year enrol . A minimum 50 dyad enrol arm trial ( total 200 dyad ) . The intervention consist six planning session . DESIGN : The dyad randomly assign one four experimental condition . The assessment main secondary outcome conduct baseline , 1 week first intervention session , post-intervention ( six intervention session complete ) , 6- , 12-month follow-up . OUTCOMES : Physical activity constitute main outcome , whereas health-related quality life ( HRQOL ) , body mass index , well self-regulatory strategy call use planning ( individual , dyadic collaborative ) secondary outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Individual , Dyadic , Collaborative Plans Physical Activity Partner-Partner Dyads
DOC.detailed_description: Individual planning ( also know implementation intention action cop planning ) regulatory strategy , refers make plan , , perform intend behavior . In dyadic planning , target person set plan together partner , , target person individually engage behavior change . The concept dyadic plan differs conceptualization collaborative plan , two individual make plan enact behavior together . The study evaluate effect short-term plan intervention . The intervention include total six session : two face-to-face session experimenter ( deliver two week ) three session deliver phone ( follow three week ) , one face-two-face session ( delivered one month third session deliver phone ) . The delivery individual format ( experimenter + dyad ) . The total time first sixth session 2 month . The setting intervention include physician 's office participant 's home . The format , schedule , delivery , set use conduct active control group procedure .
